subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Josh Selby, the nation’s most explosive high school guard yet to commit to a college, will announce his decision in his characteristically outsize way, on national television.
snippet: Josh Selby, the nation’s most explosive high school guard yet to commit to a college, will announce his decision in his characteristically outsize way, on national television.
